title: Cheesy Chicken & Broccoli Bake
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 head of broccoli, cut into florets
instructions: Steam or blanch the broccoli florets until slightly tender, about 5 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked chicken, broccoli, cheese, mayonnaise, milk, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
Pour the mixture into a greased 8x8 inch baking dish.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until heated through and bubbly.
Let cool for a few minutes before serving.
description: A comforting and easy cheesy chicken and broccoli bake, packed with protein and flavor. Perfect for a weeknight dinner.

title: Lemon Herb Baked Cod with Parmesan
instructions: Place the cod fillets in a greased baking dish.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, parsley, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour the mixture over the cod fillets.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
description: A light and flavorful baked cod recipe with lemon, herbs, and Parmesan. A healthy and easy dinner option ready in under 30 minutes.
